Full Wipe\nDeletes everything (you have been warned!)
Dirty Flash

string-array.name: set_install
string-array.item: Full Wipe\nSelect this if you choosed Full Wipe
Dirty Install\nSelect this if you choosed Dirty Flash

string-array.name: set_kernel
string-array.item: SM-G93XF Jesse Kernel\nJesse Kernel v1.1.2 for S7 Flat & S7 Edge
SM-G93XF Jesse Kernel\nJesse Kernel v1.3 for S7 flat & S7 Edge
SM-G930F Super Kernel\nStock Kernel v1.3 For Flat
SM-G935F Super Kernel\nStock Kernel v1.3 For Edge
SM-G930F Stock Kernel\nStock Kernel For Flat
SM-G935F Stock Kernel\nStock Kernel For Edge

Magisk\nSystemLess Install of Magisk Super-Su v2.76

string-array.name: set_xposed
string-array.item: Yes\nXposed V86.5 systemless Magisk Version will be installed.
No\nXposed won\'t be installed.
Yes\nXposed v85.7 SYSTEMLESS will be installed
Yes\nXposed V86.2 Stable UnOfficial SystemLess will be installed

string-array.name: set_sound
string-array.item: SoundMod v16.3\nI Will install the Sound Mod by ZuBi182
Stock\nI Will keep the Sound Untouched
SoundMod v17 Lv0\nStock Volume
SoundMod v17 Lv1\nSlightly increased values
SoundMod v17 Lv2\nIntermediate version
SoundMod v17 Lv3\nBest volume values (I use this version)

string-array.name: set_emoij
string-array.item: Install stock emoj\nWill display stock emojis in keyboard
Install IOS 9.3 emojis\nWill install different IOS emojis in keyboard

string-array.item: 530 DPI
540 DPI
640 DPI

string-array.name: set_touch
string-array.item: Stock Touchwiz\nNo,Give me Stock Touchwiz
Modded Touchwiz\nChoose Page Transitions with FirePower Settings

string-array.name: set_setting
string-array.item: Stock Settings\nJust Stock Settings without Xposed & Viper
Modded Settings\nYes, Give me Xposed & Viper in Settings
